DOC.brief_summary: We easily regard nodules and fibrosis in upper lobes of lung as TB sequelae. The aim of this study is to confirm the prevalence of latent TB infection diagnosed by interferon-gamma release assay and tuberculin skin tests in patients with old healed TB.
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence of Latent Tuberculosis (TB) Infection Diagnosed by Interferon-gamma Release Assay and Tuberculin Skin Tests in Patients With Old Healed TB
DOC.criteria: Age > 20 years Patients with TB sequelae in their CXR Patients on immunesuppressants
DOC.keyword: People who have fibrosis or nodules in their upper lobe of the lung
